description:
A Simple course that compresses everything you need
to know about Smart Objects into a few video lectures.

  • Perform nondestructive editing
  • Best Practices and Everyday uses.
  • Preserve your sources.
  • Avoid common mistakes.
  • By harnessing the power of Smart Objects.

10+ Video Lectures Awaiting your enrollment.
This Course Covers:

  • What Smart Objects are
  • How to apply Smart Objects
  • How to copy, link, replace,and modify Smart Objects
  • Smart Objects for Video, RAW, and Vector Files


Who its for
Great for designers, photographers, And creatives who use Photoshop on a regular basis.

Minimum Skill Set
Some Photoshop experience is required, If you understand the essential tools and workflow of Photoshop, this course will be within your grasp and skill set.

About Smart Objects
Smart Objects are layers that contain image data from raster or vector images, such as Photoshop or Illustrator files. Smart Objects preserve an imageâ€™s source content with all its original characteristics, enabling you to perform non-destructiv editing to the layer.
title: Simple Photoshop CC: Smart Objects
